description: This luxurious room has two single beds, tv, deskspace, ensuite and an amazing view on the wildlife.
Enjoy your stay at the zoo with a room with a double bed, artwork and a staggering window view into the park.
This lavish room includes a double bed, artwork, tv and an ensuite.
Stay overnight in a room with a double bed, artwork, ensuite and a balcony looking into the zoo's wildlife.'
